name: Duty of Galaxy Lite: Sokoban AI Robot Push Box
name_original: Duty of Galaxy Lite: Sokoban AI Robot Push Box
description:
Galaxy has collapsed, lots of puzzle is waiting for 'O'.
Duty of Galaxy has a Classic gameplay like Sokoban, and great performance on IOS.

-Simple operation
Guide the robot freely with your finger

-High-tech robot 'R-101'
Come to rescue when you are in trouble

- exquisite style
Fresh background, cute robot, take you to experience the unique charm of the classic game

-Easy share score with friends
Play with your friends and share your joy!
